name: Amazing Spider Superhero – Strange Running Game
name_original: Amazing Spider Superhero – Strange Running Game
description:
Amazing Spider Superhero is a running game of new age. Your hero is a strange hero which makes this game amazing. Your favorite spiderman has been given the opportunity to prove his skills in a running game where he has to avoid the oncoming traffic and collect coins which are present on the roof on every car.
If you have a phobia of spiders, don’t be afraid since the spiderman character is pretty much resembles the autonomy of a human. You won’t find many spiderman games in the market which matches the level of this Amazing Spider Superhero where you are a strange hero that is on a run in a running game. A run in which you have to avoid obstacles which are the various vehicles which include cars, trucks, buses etc. The amazing part is that the coins which are to collected lie on the roofs of the vehicles and you have to jump before the car hits you in order to collect that coin. This makes the game more interesting and unique from the rest of the running games in the market.
Have time to play free running games? Why not to play Amazing Spider Superhero since it is a free running game of a new era.
As you chase for the coins, you will find yourself going into subway as well and in those subway you would find new secrets and bonuses that you won’t find without any place such as a subway.
Consider that you are in a battle with those vehicles only then you would be able to succeed this amazing battle in this strange world.
A spider is an intelligent and agile specie which has the ability to deal with its predators so use your spider skills to the max and the spider endurance to keep the game moving in the right direction
There is a man obviously inside the spiderman costume. It always happens this way and everyone knows it but still people get fooled by it. It is always the man who gets fooled at the end of the day though it is generalized by the people that a man is an intelligence creature.
Features:
*Additive continuous gameplay
*Decent graphics
*For all ages
*Realistic physics
